title: (x) Which font? i love this g! - FF Meta {Igor F}
content:
[http://fontfeed.com/archives/designpreis-deutschland-2010-lauds-malabar-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815092146/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/designpreis-deutschland-2010-lauds-malabar-and-lirico/ "http://fontfeed.com/archives/designpreis-deutschland-2010-lauds-malabar-and-lirico/")

Which font is used for Designpreis Deutschland title? lowercase letter "g" is something i'm looking for a while!

| --- | --- |

author: kaisersoze

comments.content:
Here's Meta and find "Meta Normal" and "Meta Bold"  
[link removed by moderator, see note below]

Gustavo,  
linking to illegal download sites is not tolerated on Typophile. Don’t post links to pirated fonts.  
 [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815092146/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann)’s [Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815092146/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=meta) is a commercial font, you need to license it in order to use it. Learn about [the value of type](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815092146/http:/www.letterror.com/content/value/index.html).  
Florian
Florian, I would like to talk with you in private. I'm going to send an e-mail to you, so I would like to make an interesting and polemic quetsion.
Florian, I've just sent you. Please read my message. Thank you!
